content.rendered:
Passionate about teaching is one line that explains Seetha and that has what has kept her here for 24 years and going strong.  Seetha believes that this profession demands one to be a constant learner and she invests time in enhancing her knowledge to keep herself up-to-date.  Seetha is passionate about nature and travelling.  Gardening is her best hobby, which is driven by her love for nature.  She also loves cooking and trying out new recipes – all she needs is a guinea pig!!

Courses taught

  • Management Accounting
  • Business Strategy
  • Human Resources Management
  • Innovation and Commercialisation
  • Advanced Management Accounting
  • Financial Management
